metadata.name: RestoredMonstersPack
metadata.description:
Forgotten enemies have returned to the basement! Restored Monsters Pack is a mod that adds enemies ranging from unused monsters left in Repentance to new enemies based of developer concepts
[img]https://i.imgur.com/t58xA5L.png[/img]
[h2]Features[/h2] [b]30+ enemies[/b], ranging from unused monsters left in Repentance to new enemies based of developer concepts A [b]new TNT[/b] variant [b]Many new rooms[/b], with some from the original Antibirth mod [b]Reworks and polishing[/b] of some of the enemies from their previous iterations (No more Dumplings camping rocks!) [b]Compatibility[/b] The enemies from this mod also show up on modded floors, such as Boiler and Glacier. Some modded floors even have unique crossover enemies! (It has no overlap with Last Judgement) You can read more about the enemies added by this mod on our wiki! ( https://tboicompliance.wiki.gg/wiki/Monsters )
[h2]Caution![/h2] [b][u]The following mods are included in some form within Restored Monsters Pack, and should not be used in conjunction with it:[/u][/b]
Cut Monsters Antibirth Monsters Antibirth Minus by [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198081320400]Sinbiscuit[/url] Strifers by [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/PixelPlz]PixelPlz[/url] Corpse Eaters by [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/PixelPlz]PixelPlz[/url] Dumplings by [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/24chrome]24Chrome[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/jubbalub]Jubbalub[/url], and [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/We_Strvn]We Strvn[/url] Ghost Babel by [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198081320400]Sinbiscuit[/url]
[h2]Contributors[/h2] We Strvn, Sillst, Redstinger, Pandora, InfiniteCosmos, Kittenchilly, Mr. R, Kerkel, vor_kakisha, Acexolotl, Goganidze, Michael8587, Watchmeojo, Skelej64, Lesser_Star, ENFOR, PixelPls, Amy, Lazarus, Firework, Brakedude, Orange Ice Pop, Reixen, and steve2552.
[h2]Special thanks to[/h2] [code][u]Public Entertainment Networked Interactive Software[/u] - For the original Antibirth mod as well as the content and concepts that this mod builds off of[/code]
[h2]About Repentance+[/h2] This mod is built to work with the base Repentance DLC. It has not been tested or integrated with Repentance+, but it should function as normal on the DLC. If you run into any issues on Rep+ please let us know so that when REPENTOGON is available on Rep+ we can fix it.
[h2]Restored Hub Discord Link[h2] https://discord.gg/BYGmAhgG8k
